about.achievement: 81,803,969 lines of code written per month
about.description: Full Stack Engineer for almost ten years with solid knowledge in web development, having worked for different markets, including Latin America, Europe, and the Middle East. A self-organized and persistent programmer who is able to be resilient in brand-new environments and share knowledge with clarity, either on a daily basis or while mentoring someone. Always eager to take a step back to learn and grow as a web artist.
